00017 #define CPSS_DEFAULT_MAKE_ID(ptr) (reinterpret_cast<long>(ptr))
00018 
00019 class cpSpaceSerializerDelegate
00020 {
00021 public:
00022         virtual long makeId(cpShape* shape) {return CPSS_DEFAULT_MAKE_ID(shape);}
00023         virtual long makeId(cpBody* body) {return CPSS_DEFAULT_MAKE_ID(body);}
00024         virtual long makeId(cpConstraint* constraint) {return CPSS_DEFAULT_MAKE_ID(constraint);}
00025         
00026         virtual bool writing(cpShape *shape, long shapeId) {return true;}
00027         virtual bool writing(cpBody *body, long bodyId) {return true;}
00028         virtual bool writing(cpConstraint *constraint, long constraintId) {return true;}
00029         
00030         virtual bool reading(cpShape *shape, long shapeId) {return true;}
00031         virtual bool reading(cpBody *body, long bodyId) {return true;}
00032         virtual bool reading(cpConstraint *constraint, long constraintId) {return true;}
00033 };
